title: Understanding the FV Function
text: The FV function is used in financial calculations. It helps determine the value of an investment at a future date, given certain conditions.

title: Components of the FV Function
text: The FV function considers periodic payments, a constant interest rate, and a specific number of periods to calculate the future value.

hintAnswer: future value of an investment based on periodic, constant payments and constant interest rate
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes what the FV function returns?
choices: future value of an investment based on periodic, constant payments and constant interest rate
future value of an investment based on periodic, variable payments and variable interest rate
future value of an investment based present value
